title: Nocturne Players Assemble
body:
So Ive been playing a good bit of nocturne and I just wanna get some feedback on play styles of other nocturne mains (if you exist).
My biggest problem is "what do you do when your lanes are losing?". When lanes are ahead its easy to gank and snowball even further but when they get like double killed early pre-6 you are kinda like.. im useless.

Anyways, let me know what you think
